vil3d_find_blob_connectivity  conn,

)

Identify and enumerate all disjoint blobs in a binary image.

Parameters:
srcInput binary image, where false=background, true=foreground.
Return values:
dstOutput int image; 0=background, and 1...n are labels for each disjoint blob.
